#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
//#define lli long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int b,t,k,c,m,n,corr,inc;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
		corr=n*k;
		c=0;
		inc=0;
		while(n>0)
		{
			m=n%10;
			if(m==k)
			b=m*2;
			else
			b=m*k;
			inc+=b*pow(10,c);
			c++;
			//printf("inc=%lld\n",inc);
			n/=10;
		}
		corr+=inc;
		printf("%lld\n",corr);
	}
}
